Group hierarchy: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.

To have high reduncy (also to faciliate blue green deployment) we have  provisioned a cut down infra in another vpc(which will have 2 LB 1 Web Server, 1 App server , 1 Nate gateway). We have also increased the instance type specs of webserver and application server. One extra RDS reader has been added to support more redundancies)
